name: Oh My God
description:
"Oh My God" is a point and click adventure game made for the AdventureJam 2022. 

Supported languages are English and German.

Controls
  • Left Click: Interact
  • Right Click: Examine
  • Inventory/Menu: Top edge of the screen
  • Not compatible with touch devices!
Credits Team members:
  • Esmeralda (aka EsmeraldaW on www.gamejolt.com)
  • Einzelkämpfer
  • Anke
  • z10
Music:
  • "Autumn Leaves 2" by Maarten Schellekens (CC BY-NC 4.0, freemusicarchive.org)
SFX:
  • "Sheep" by Erdie (CC BY 4.0, freesound.org)
  • "Horror fleshy impale impact with remains falling" by UOregonCinemaStudies, (CC BY 3.0, freesond.org)
  • several CC0 licensed sounds
Third Party Engine:

The game was created with Visionaire Studio 5

FAQ Why is the game so silent? Is it a bug?

No bug. Finding appropriate music for our setting turned out to be quite a challenge. And then time ran out (we had to meet the submission deadline for AdventureJam 2022). So enjoy the silence.
